body:
BRANCH: master
COMMIT: 6696b4635ceb9b47aaa63244bff9032fa7b08354
ISSUE COUNT: 13
EXCLUDED: `src/bench`, `src/test`, `src/qt`

DISCLAIMER: These results have not been thoroughly confirmed, and may be improbable or flat out invalid, but it's worth having a list of these somewhere.

==============================================

SEMANTIC ISSUES [2 present, 0 confirmed]:
* [src/init.cpp:1524:58](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/init.cpp#L1524:58): Variable `nStart` may be uninitialized when used here
* [src/rpc/server.cpp:496:29](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/server.cpp#L496:29): Code will never be executed

LOGIC ERROR [6 present, 0 confirmed, 1 fixed]:
* [src/rpc/mining.cpp:551:20](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/mining.cpp#L551:20): Access to field `nNonce` results in a dereference of a null pointer (loaded from variable `pblock`)
* [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:506:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L506:5): Access to field `nHeight` results in a dereference of a null pointer (loaded from variable `pindex`):
   1 [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:429:9](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L429:9): Assuming `fPruneMode` is 0
   2 [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:449:12](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L449:12): Loop body executed 0 times
   3 [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:499:27](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L499:27): Calling `CChain::Tip`
   4 [src/chain.h:429:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/chain.h#L429:5): Entered call from `importwallet`
   5 [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:499:27](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L499:27): Returning from `CChain::Tip`
   6 [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:499:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L499:5): `pindex` initialized here
   7 [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:500:12](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L500:12): Assuming pointer value is null
   8 [src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp:506:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/rpcdump.cpp#L506:5): Access to field `nHeight` results in a dereference of a null pointer (loaded from variable `pindex`)
* #9549 fixes ~~~[src/net_processing.cpp:341:14](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/net_processing.cpp#L341:14): Dereference of null pointer (loaded from variable `pit`)~~~
   1 [src/net_processing.cpp:2265:21](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/net_processing.cpp#L2265:21): Passing null pointer value via 5th parameter `pit` in call to `MarkBlockAsInFlight`
   2 [src/net_processing.cpp:334:1](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/net_processing.cpp#L334:1): Entered call from `ProcessMessage`
   3 [src/net_processing.cpp:341:14](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/net_processing.cpp#L341:14): Dereference of null pointer (loaded from variable `pit`)
* [src/wallet/wallet.cpp:502:14](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/wallet.cpp#L502:14): Called C++ object pointer is null
   * if `for` loop on line 486 loops zero times, or
   * if for all loops, `n >= nMinOrderPos` (Will add path details if desired, but it's long.)
* [src/wallet/wallet.cpp:2335:49](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/wallet.cpp#L2335:49): Division by zero
   * A path going from [src/wallet/wallet.cpp:2252:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/wallet.cpp#L2252:5)` where `nSubtractFeeFromAmount` is initialized to 0 leads to a division by zero. (Will add path details if desired, but it's long.)
* [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1145:50](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1145:50): Access to field `nHeight` results in a dereference of a null pointer (loaded from variable `block`)
   1 [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1119:49](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1119:49): Assuming `pindexBestHeader` is null
   2 [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1139:9](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1139:9): Assuming `fPruneMode` is not equal to 0
   3 [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1141:30](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1141:30): Calling `CChain::Tip`
   4 [src/chain.h:429:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/chain.h#L429:5): Entered call from `getblockchaininfo`
   5 [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1141:30](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1141:30): Returning from `CChain::Tip`
   6 [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1141:9](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1141:9): `block` initialized here
   7 [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1142:16](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1142:16): Assuming pointer value is null
   8 [src/rpc/blockchain.cpp:1145:50](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/rpc/blockchain.cpp#L1145:50): Access to field `nHeight` results in a dereference of a null pointer (loaded from variable `block`)

DEAD STORE [4 present, 0 confirmed, 1 fixed]:
* #9532 fixes: ~~~[src/addrman.cpp:61:9](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/addrman.cpp#L61:9): Value stored to `nSinceLastSeen` is never read~~~
* [src/pubkey.cpp:129:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/pubkey.cpp#L129:5): Value stored to `pos` is never read
* [src/policy/fees.cpp:103:18](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/policy/fees.cpp#L103:18): Value stored to `curFarBucket` during its initialization is never read
* [src/wallet/wallet.cpp:3564:18](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/wallet/wallet.cpp#L3564:18): Value stored to `pindexRescan` during its initialization is never read

MEMORY ERROR [1 present, 0 confirmed]:
* [src/httpserver.cpp:609:15](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/httpserver.cpp#L609:15): Potential leak of memory pointed to by `ev`
   1 [src/httpserver.cpp:258:9](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/httpserver.cpp#L258:9): Calling `HTTPRequest::WriteReply`
   2 [src/httpserver.cpp:599:1](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/httpserver.cpp#L599:1): Entered call from `http_request_cb`
   3 [src/httpserver.cpp:604:5](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/httpserver.cpp#L604:5): Assuming `evb` is non-null
   4 [src/httpserver.cpp:606:21](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/httpserver.cpp#L606:21): Memory is allocated
   5 [src/httpserver.cpp:609:15](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/httpserver.cpp#L609:15): Potential leak of memory pointed to by `ev`
title: 6696b46: Clang Static Analyzer Report
